channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: NassifMD Skincare
channel.desc: Join us for this exciting beauty range developed by Dr Nassif. Discover products designed to boost your skin's natural radiance and appearance, delivering remarkable results.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Australian Bodycare
channel.desc: This Australian Bodycare range is inspired by the ancient traditions of the Aborigines who discovered the effects of natural ingredients. Find cleansing and caring products for your skin.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: August Beauty Offers
channel.desc: Boost your beauty bag with must-have make-up, spectacular skincare and more, all at incredible offer prices! Dive into the deals and treat yourself today.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Alison Young with Dr. Stine
channel.desc: Discover simple, effective anti-ageing skincare with Dr. Stine, presented by Alison Young. Explore quality skincare essentials designed for visible results and effortless routines.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: M. Asam Beauty Is Our Tradition
channel.desc: Enjoy younger looking skin with M.Asam, an effective skincare range that blends innovative technique and ingredients including grape oil, to target fine lines and wrinkles.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Steals and Deals
channel.desc: Love beauty? Tune in to see the latest deals and bag a beauty bargain. We've got an exciting array of popular and iconic brands plus cult products you're sure to adore.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty Refresh
channel.desc: Feeling a little rundown after Christmas? Join us for the January Beauty Weekend show with brand new products, must-have favourites and Today's Special Value offers from Tria and Decleor.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Live Well with Ultrasun
channel.desc: From running errands to holidays in the sunshine, UItrasun has you covered! Offering incredible SPF formulas for the whole family, discover non-greasy, powerful sun cream that lets you feel fabulous.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Beauty For You
channel.desc: With the festive season not too far away, get ahead of the crowd and stock up on your favourite beauty - just for you. Plus, with Easy Pay offers, there's never been a better excuse to treat yourself.

channel.name: QVC Beauty UK
channel.title: Elemis Skin Therapies
channel.desc: Care for your mind and body holistically and sensuously with therapeutic aromatherapy. Elemis are famed for their premier spa and salon treatments, and for the absolute purity of their plant oils.

channel.title: In the Salon with SBC
channel.desc: SBC have captured the essences of plants to soothe your body. Tune in to find out how your skin can benefit from their renowned natural gel formulations.

channel.title: Philip Kingsley
channel.desc: Tune in for an hour of volume-boosting haircare from trichologist brand Philip Kingsley, featuring targeted picks from the Density range to help promote the look of thickness and fullness.
